plz can I have some help with mpd ?: it's just a config file, but apparantly apt-get misses it; create an empty file named /etc/mpd.conf and try again
I have tried that and now I get "* /etc/mpd.conf must have pid_file set; cannot stop daemon." when I try removing it and it exits with error
I get this "5177  4163  0 20:48 pts/1    00:00:00 grep --color=auto mpd"
so mpd is not running? try to add a line like this in /etc/mpd.conf: pid_file "/tmp/mpd.pid"
it seems it should be like this: pid_file "/var/run/mpd/pid"
with this config mpd won't work btw, so reinstall and create a proper config; have fun, mpd is the best
